==Translingual==

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|mul|異}} – Unicode z-code variants at points U+7570 and U+F962

===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} – a man with a mask ([[田]]) over his face (different face) – see [http://www.chineseetymology.org/CharacterASP/CharacterEtymology.aspx?characterInput=%E7%95%B0&submitButton1=Etymology Chinese Etymology: 異], by Richard Sears.

Compare {{m|mul|鬼||demon|sc=Hani}}, where the 田 also derives from a face.

Modern form is graphically {{Han compound|田|共}}, though this is not the etymology. Unrelated to visually similar [[暴]].
